attributes.action: Say no the new Cardiff Central Station
attributes.additional_details:
National Rail are planning a major upgrade to Cardiff Central train station. A station that is already on par with most around the country and In my opinion is just simply not needed.

Cardiff is experiencing a shortage in social housing, lack of employment and a lack of public service resources.
National Rail will be looking to the "UK Department of Transport" for the money out of the budget, so it is us the tax-payer who will inevitably be footing the bill.

This is wasted money that is going to be given to the Department of Transport, that could be budgeted in other sectors that need it far more.
